entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
